item.title: Alumni
item.description: Master Students img.minion { border: 1px solid #ddd; /* Gray border */ border-radius: 4px; /* Rounded border */ padding: 5px; /* Some padding */ width: 175px; /* Set a small width */ } /* Add a hover effect (blue shadow) */ img.minion:hover { box-shadow: 0 0 2px 1px rgba(0, 140, 186, 0.5); } * { box-sizing: border-box; } /* Create two equal columns that floats next to each other */ .
